summary: Multiple Elven Armors and A Weapons Set
descriptionHtml:
[color=cyan] Please Endorse...and leave comment If Liked. [/color]

                                                       [color=red]UPDATE! [/color]
                            Version 1.4  Fixed the first person on all armors.
                                             Fixed the missing craft items. added Champion and             DarkChampion shield.
                                             Added Variations to the Female Knight and champion Armors.
                          [color=red]Still no slider supports for female knight or champion! [/color]

[youtube]HuonVT7Jc_Y[/youtube]  [youtube]lhL0L6Y6xqc[/youtube]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/presentationalfheim.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/834/presentationalfheim.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/819/presentatioalfheim2.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img819/9584/presentatioalfheim2.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/69/presentatioalfheim3.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img69/4474/presentatioalfheim3.png[/IMG][/URL]



[color=cyan][/color]
[color=white]Release date: 18 March 2013[/color]

Category:Armor and Weapons
Author: Jgreybear (Jgreybear@live.com)
Version:1.0   

REQUIREMENTS
============
Skyrim & Skyrim Update

RECOMENDED
==========
This is a standalone.

Description
===========
This is a Recreation of my Ayleid Armor from Oblivion.(Not a Port.)Tried to do it more in a Elven Knight style..Think Elven Lancelot, Or Falmer Clan that Embraced the North And Thrived with the Nords As Equals. Not the Most Lore friendly i Know.. But Fun!

[color=red]WARNING! [/color]

Location
========
Can all be made.Under Elven Blacksmithing if you have the ElvenSmithing perk.
 
Install
=======
Bets if installed with NMM. or place the files in your data folder.

Uninstall
=========
reverse of install.


Incompatibility
===============
None I know of.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Thier are some minor clipping issues. especially with the female knight version

Contact
=======
jgreybear@live.com

Credits
=======

                            [color=red]Special Thanx to JoJJo [/color]
Textures :[color=lime]Jgreybear[/color]
Models:[color=lime]Jgreybear/Jojjo[/color] Slightly modified
Thanks to [color=lime]SkyrimNexus[/color] team for the articles, tutorials and all the wonderful stuff gathered here.
Thanks to [color=lime]Bethesda[/color] for the best game and the opportunity given to us to create new stuff (the Construction Kit ). 
           
Tools Used
==========
Construction Kit
NIFSkope
Photoshop
Blender

             [color=red] absolutely No! part of this mod is allowed! on Steam [/color]


Licensing
===============
 No Part of this Mod is to be reproduced. Must get permissions.
author: Jgreybear

files.name: AlfheimKnights_1_4
files.changelogHtml:
Added Variations for Female Knights and Championd.
All previous Fixes added and First persion veiws Should now work Right.
Added Champion and DarkChampion Shields. and everything should now be craftable and Temperable
Still lack Slider support for female Knights and Champions
